paragraphs: Did Arkasis leave you any additional instructions for this experiment? I have the gloomspore agaric and a considerable amount of spider eggs on hand, but no organs were provided. Where am I supposed to get that? Don't tell me that's why he's got that thing lurking around in here. He can't seriously expect me to harvest it from that. I mean, look at it!
If you have any more details, please help. The boss is going to be checking on the experiment tomorrow and I haven't even started!
